channel.title: Halo Spear Atempt
channel.description: Ok i sorda fiddled around with the halo blade model and some spear/staff and created these things....I call the green one guthix halo spear. the blue one saradomin halo spear and the red one zamorac halo spear ( yes i know i didnt spell zammy right but idk how to)

item.title: Halo Spear Atempt
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

kirikugi:

well im new at modeling so im trying and im getting critisisms from some people who dont even model… all i can say is atleast im trying

Well atleast try something that hasn’t been made. Even if it’s a sword, just make something that isn’t someone elses work. You feel like you accomplished more.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo Spear Atempt
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“kirikugi, post:13, topic:336772”]ok thanx everyone …nd for the people that are bitching…i clearly stated that i combined a premade staff and the halo energy sword …if you people would just take the time to read these things instead of jumping to conclusion then mopar would be a better place…nd yes i do know how to convert …

and if you are fussing about this or anything else …every single model has a purpose and someone somewhere likes it so just shut up .if you are going to criticize someone on contributing then you might as well not take the time to read it[/quote]
This is a place where we post models that we make. And for some of us who spend time making a model, it kills us to see stuff like Recolored skillcapes, quick done weapons, item combinations, remade d pl8s, ect.
All we are asking is that you try to make some original. 65% of the models section is filled with the shit I listed above. That means if we removed all that along with spam threads, and requests (from when this section originally started) we may have 25-35 pages of decent models that have some effort. We just don’t want another person contributing to the list of combinations, skillcapes, ect. ect.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo Spear Atempt

and if you are fussing about this or anything else …every single model has a purpose and someone somewhere likes it so just shut up .if you are going to criticize someone on contributing then you might as well not take the time to read it
